citation.abstract: I have a confession to make…I went to an all-boys private school. Go on, admit it. You just judged me a little bit, didn’t you? I can’t blame you. Looking back – and even at the time – the whole experience…
citation.title: The rumble in the jungle: Single-sex vs. coeducational schooling

news.title: Canberra Grammar School goes co-ed: Arguments for and against co-education
news.summary: GPS school breaks with over a century of tradition Students and staff react to the news that The Armidale School will be co-ed from next year PT1M24S620349 Canberra Grammar School to become co-educational Girls Grammar responds to co-ed announcement…

news.summary: The subject of co-education in schools is one unlikely to be settled anytime soon.
